anya-e0605n0:4_0: Yo lokatthāya buddho dhanasutabhariyāaṅgajīve cajitvā pūretvā āramiyo tidasamanupame bodhipakkhīyadhamme,
anya-e0605n0:5_0: Patvā bodhiṃ visuddhaṃ sakalaguṇadadaṃ seṭṭhabhūto tiloke,
anya-e0605n0:6_0: Katvā dukkhassa antaṃ katasubhajanataṃ dukkhato mocayittha.
anya-e0605n0:9_0: Nāhu yenapi tulyo kusalamahimato uttamo bhūtaloke tassevāyaṃ uvimhaṃ suvipulamamalaṃ bodhisambhārabhūtaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:10_0: Hetuṃ hetvānurūpaṃ sugatagataphalaṃ bhāsato me suṇātha.
anya-e0605n0:13_0: Jāto yo navame khaṇe sutadharo sīlena suddhindriyo saṃsāraṃ ayato bhavakkayakaraṃ disvā sivaṃ khemato,
anya-e0605n0:14_0: Taṃ sampāpakamaggadesakamuniṃ sampūjayanto tato uddhānussatibhāvanādikamato sampādaye taṃ sivaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:17_0: Buddhoti ko buddhaguṇo ti ko so,
anya-e0605n0:42_0: Ye tesu devā manujā ca brahmā,
anya-e0605n0:67_0: Na tena tulyo paramo ca vijjati;
anya-e0605n0:68_0: Kiṃ taṃ guṇaṃ taṃ sadisena dinnaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:111_0: Uppannuppannake so jinavaramatule pūjayitvā asesaṃ buddho eso hi oso bhavati niyamato byākato tehi tehi
anya-e0605n0:111_1: tesaṃ tesaṃ jinānaṃ acanamanupamaṃ pūjayitvā sirena,
anya-e0605n0:112_0: Taṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ sahitvā sakalaguṇadadaṃ pāramī pūrayittha.
anya-e0605n0:167_0: Sato ca sampajāno ca mātukucchimhi okkami;
anya-e0605n0:171_0: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā va sā mātā puttaṃ passati kucchiyaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:180_0: Devā ca nāgā asurā ca yakkhā;
anya-e0605n0:205_0: Sīhanādaṃ nadī tesaṃ devatānaṃ hi sāvayaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:207_0: Tato puttaṃ gahetvāna gatā mātā sakaṅgharaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:221_0: Kālakkamena cando va vaḍḍhanto vaḍḍhite kule,
anya-e0605n0:224_0: Siddhathako hi siddhattho laddhā deviṃ yasodharaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:232_0: Namo tassa yato mahimato yassa tamo na
anya-e0605n0:318_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:323_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:328_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:333_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:338_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:353_0: Naccanti tā surapure vaṇitā va tāva.
anya-e0605n0:373_0: Hitvā kathaṃ nu padamuddhari so nirāso.
anya-e0605n0:378_0: Disvādisvā iti ratikaraṃ yāti hāhā kimīhā.
anya-e0605n0:384_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:389_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:394_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:399_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:404_0: Hitvā gata so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:409_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:414_0: Hitvā gato so sugato gato va.
anya-e0605n0:430_0: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n0:435_0: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n0:445_0: Hitvā gato so sugato va nūna.
anya-e0605n0:475_0: Tathā hi māro pi tadāha santiṃ,
anya-e0605n0:491_0: Lokāyātatayā kālo visesaṃ na na saṃsevi,
anya-e0605n0:492_0: Visesaṃ na na saṃsevi lokā yātatayā kālo.
anya-e0605n0:499_0: Kaṅkhāgāhakakaṅkhāgha hā hā kaṅkhā kahaṃ kahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:512_0: Nunnānenāni nūna na nānanaṃ nānanena no.
anya-e0605n0:517_0: Devānaṃ nandano devo devadeva na nandi no,
anya-e0605n0:560_0: Datvāna maṃsaṃ rajjaṃ pitā suddhodano tadā,
anya-e0605n0:569_0: Etha gaṇgatha bandhatha chaṭṭetha ceṭakaṃ imaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:575_0: Cakkāvudhaṃ khipento pi nāsakkhi kiñci kātave,
anya-e0605n0:578_0: Siddhattha kasmā āsi nu āsane mama santake,
anya-e0605n0:579_0: Uṭṭhehi āsanā no ce phālemi hadayaṃ tava.
anya-e0605n0:582_0: Pitā vudikkhi taṃ māraṃ mettāyanto dayaparo.
anya-e0605n0:584_0: Tadā so asambhivācaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadī muni,
anya-e0605n0:585_0: Na jānāti sayaṃ mayhaṃ dāsabhāvapiyaṃ khaḷo.
anya-e0605n0:587_0: Yena kenaci kammena jāto devapure vare,
anya-e0605n0:597_0: Ko hi nāma kareyyañño anummatto sacetano.
anya-e0605n0:602_0: Nāhaṃ manussomanusso na brahmā na ca devatā,
anya-e0605n0:606_0: Buddho bodhitale hutvā tāremi janataṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0605n0:608_0: Samantā dhajinaṃ disvā yuddhaṃ māraṃ savāhanaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:609_0: Yuddhāya paccugacchāmi mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi.
anya-e0605n0:611_0: Yante taṃ nappasahati senaṃ loko sadevako,
anya-e0605n0:612_0: Tante paññāya gacchāmi āmaṃ pattaṃ va asmanā.
anya-e0605n0:614_0: Icchanto sāsape gabbhe caṅkamāmi ito cito,
anya-e0605n0:618_0: Atthi thāmaṃ balaṃ mayhaṃ pāṇaghāto na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0605n0:621_0: Mayhaṃ hi tena pāpena sallāpo pi na yujjati.
anya-e0605n0:624_0: Kampitā maddiyā dānā sakkhi hoti ayaṃ mahī.
anya-e0605n0:626_0: Iti vatvā dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ pathaviyā paṇamayi,
anya-e0605n0:630_0: Tasmiṃ majjhe gato māro sapariso bhayatajjito.
anya-e0605n0:636_0: Purato gacchati cando rajatacakkaṃ va ambare,
anya-e0605n0:642_0: Sakko tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhaṃ dhamanto abhidhāvati,
anya-e0605n0:648_0: Evaṃ dasasahassamhi sakko brahmā ca devatā,
anya-e0605n0:654_0: Tattha naccanti gāyanti seḷenti vādayanti ca,
anya-e0605n0:681_0: Tato hi dutiye yāme yathāyammupage sari,
anya-e0605n0:687_0: Tato so tatiye yāme dvādasaṅge asesato,
anya-e0605n0:697_0: Paññāya mohaṃ chetvāna micchādiṭṭhi tatheva ca.
anya-e0605n0:705_0: Evaṃ dānādinā taṃ taṃ kilesaṇgaṃ vinodayaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:706_0: Suvaḍḍhitā mahāpaññā kathaṃ santiṃ na rūhati.
anya-e0605n0:712_0: Ekkattha dāni sampattiṃ deti bodhiṃ asaṃsayaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:717_0: Savāsane kilese so jhāpentonumattaṃ pi ca,
anya-e0605n0:742_0: Addhā laddhā suladdhaṃ vatamiti satataṃ cintayanto subodhiṃ;
anya-e0605n0:750_0: Na pūjaye ko hi naro sacetano.
anya-e0605n0:778_0: Ye pissa te bhagavato ca acintiyādī,
anya-e0605n0:804_0: Takkabyākaraṇañca dhammavinayaṃ sutvā pi yo paññavā,
anya-e0605n0:806_0: Hetuñcāpi phalena tena saphalaṃ sampassamāno tato bodhiṃ saddahateva tassa mahatāvāyamato sambhavaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:825_0: Thalaje jalaje vāpi sugandhe ca agandhake.
anya-e0605n0:840_0: Vassikā mallikā sālā koviḷārā ca pāṭali.
anya-e0605n0:842_0: Indīvarā asokā ca kaṇikārā ca makulā,
anya-e0605n0:845_0: Ete caññe ca rukkhā ca valliyo cāpi pupphitā,
anya-e0605n0:849_0: Kāḷā setā ca mañjaṭṭha nekavaṇṇā supupphitā.
anya-e0605n0:857_0: Athetta sakuṇā santi dijā mañjussarā subhā,
anya-e0605n0:864_0: Tasmiṃ hi kinnarā kiccaṃ padīpena karīyati.
anya-e0605n0:870_0: Sakuṇānaṃ hi saddena mayūrānaṃ hi kekayā.
anya-e0605n0:875_0: Pabbatānaṃ hi obhāsā maṇīnaṃ jotiyāpi ca,
anya-e0605n0:877_0: Evaṃ sabbaṅgasampannaṃ kiṃ siyā nandanaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:884_0: Nāgaloke manusse ca deve brahme ca yaṃ siyā,
anya-e0605n0:891_0: Buddho bodhesi sattānaṃ tassa pūjemi taṃ dhanaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:893_0: Khomaṃ koseyyaṃ kappāsaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅgañca kambalaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:894_0: Dukūlāni ca dibbāni dussāni vividhāni te.
anya-e0605n0:897_0: Yassa siddhaṃ siyā tassa dussāni pujayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:950_0: Svāyaṃ dhammo vinayo ca desito sādhukaṃ mayā,
anya-e0605n0:951_0: Mamaccayena so satthā dhātu cāpi sarīrajā.
anya-e0605n0:959_0: Tasmā hi tassa saddhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā yathātathaṃ,
anya-e0605n0:960_0: Yo deseti sambuddho ti natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:971_0: Yattha katthaci sayito āsinno caṅkamepi vā,
anya-e0605n0:974_0: Na sañjānanti ye buddhaṃ evarūpo ti ñātve,
anya-e0605n0:975_0: Kataṃ taṃ paṭimaṃ sabbaṃ natvāna pūjayāmahaṃ.
anya-e0605n0:989_0: Paññā ca me sijjhatu yāva bodhiṃ.
anya-e0605n0:998_0: Bhogo ca kāyo ca mamesa laddho,
